content.query:
SELECT
  p.patient_id AS patient_id, YEAR(CAST(p.birthDate AS date)) as year,
  COUNT(*) AS count_claims
FROM
  [fhir].[claims_main] c
  INNER JOIN [fhir].[PatientIdentifier] p
    ON c.patient_id_reference = p.patient_id
WHERE
  p.gender = 'Male'
  AND (YEAR(CAST(p.birthDate AS date)) < 2005 AND YEAR(CAST(p.birthDate AS date)) > 1998)
  AND YEAR(CAST(c.created AS date)) > 2020
GROUP BY
  p.patient_id,
  YEAR(CAST(p.birthDate AS date));
